sentences.en: At elevated humidities mixtures of soluble and insoluble material are often readily discernible in single particles.
sentences.cn: 在大湿度时,可溶的和不可溶的物质的混合物很容易在单个粒子中辨认出来.

sentences.en: Far away the outline of the island is just discernible.
sentences.cn: 远处，岛屿轮廓仅依稀可辨。

sentences.en: Foreign Minister Fahmy was barely discernible at the bottom of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 外交部长法赫米站在舷梯下面,隐约可见.

sentences.en: Her face was barely discernible in the gloom.
sentences.cn: 在黑暗中几乎辨认不出她的脸来.

sentences.en: In a more rudimentary form, this analysis is discernible in a number of other modern opinions.
sentences.cn: 这一分析以较为初步的形式在其他一些近代主张中亦可辨别出来.

sentences.en: It has no discernible effect on spondylitis.
sentences.cn: 这对脊椎炎无明显影响.

sentences.en: Night fell, but the outline of the factory buildings was still discernible.
sentences.cn: 夜幕降临了, 但厂房还能看见个轮廓.

sentences.en: Recurring themes are readily discernible in the annals of history.
sentences.cn: 在历史纪录上完全可以找到重复的主题.

sentences.en: Roads were dusty tracks scarely discernible from the adjacent desert.
sentences.cn: 道路是尘土覆盖的小道,几乎难以跟两边的沙漠区分开来.

sentences.en: The difference between the two is readily discernible.
sentences.cn: 两者之间的差别不难看出.

sentences.en: The difference should be discernible in the time of flowering and pollination in orchards.
sentences.cn: 在种子园的开花和传粉时,可以看出这一差异.

sentences.en: The skyline is easily discernible even at a distance of several miles.
sentences.cn: 甚至在几英里之外都可清晰地辨别出地平线.

sentences.en: The two constituent frequencies are clearly discernible.
sentences.cn: 可以清楚地辨别出两种成分的频率来.

sentences.en: Weak as it is, the disturbance in the wind field is discernible.
sentences.cn: 该风场的扰动虽然很弱, 但是还是可以看得出来.

sentences.en: Yet only discernible variation is in growth rate.
sentences.cn: 但仅在生长速度上能分辨的差异.

words.tran_cn: 有辨识能力的；眼光敏锐的

trans.tran_en: If something is discernible, you can see it or recognize that it exists
